com.nextpeer.android
Class NextpeerTournamentCustomMessage

java.lang.Object
  com.nextpeer.android.NextpeerTournamentCustomMessage

public final class NextpeerTournamentCustomMessage
extends java.lang.Object

Can be used to create custom notifications and events while engaging the other players that are currently playing. The container that is passed contains the sending user's name and image as well as the message being sent.

Field Summary
 byte[] customMessage
          The custom message (passed as a buffer).
 java.lang.String playerId
          A unique player identifier for the current game.
 java.lang.String playerImageUrl
          The player's profile image URL.
 boolean playerIsBot
          Boolean value that indicates if this message came form a bot recording or a real-life player.
 java.lang.String playerName
          The player name.
